meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Caribbean Braces for Storm As Hurricane Georges bears down on them with winds of 135 miles an hour, residents of Puerto Rico and a dozen smaller Caribbean islands are bracing for the season's most powerful storm. Page A10.

Florida's Other Side There is a Florida less well known than the one of urban sprawl and sun-and-fun tourist spots, one that grows peanuts, cotton and timber, calls itself ''lower Alabama'' and can swing elections. Page A10.

Kohl Opponent's Baggage During his quest to replace Helmut Kohl as Germany's Chancellor, Gerhard Schroder has been trying to show that he is worldly and modern. But his record in his home state is coming back to haunt him. Page A8.

Caribbean Braces for Storm As Hurricane Georges bears down on them with winds of 135 miles an hour, residents of Puerto Rico and a dozen smaller Caribbean islands are bracing for the season's most powerful storm. Page A10.

Florida's Other Side There is a Florida less well known than the one of urban sprawl and sun-and-fun tourist spots, one that grows peanuts, cotton and timber, calls itself ''lower Alabama'' and can swing elections. Page A10.

Kohl Opponent's Baggage During his quest to replace Helmut Kohl as Germany's Chancellor, Gerhard Schroder has been trying to show that he is worldly and modern. But his record in his home state is coming back to haunt him. Page A8.
